Html:
Hello Guys,

is it possible to Create more than one instance of the CTP?
I have a COM AddIn wich shows a Ribbon Bar and one CTP.

If i open Word my CTP is loaded an Visible but if i create a new Document another Word Windows pops up but the CTP is not shown. The Ribbon is still there.

I have an toggle CTP visibility button in my Ribbon Bar. If i clicked on this Ribbon button in the second Word Session, the CTP in Word Session 1 is hiding.

But i need for every Session one independently CPT. is this possible?

greetings mok
